mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}, MEMBER_IM = #{memberIm} WHERE MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, MEMBER_IMG AS memberImg FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNickname}

SELECT g.GROUP_NO AS groupNo, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG AS groupMainImg, g.GROUP_NAME AS groupName, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE AS groupIntroduce, c.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION AS maxPopulation, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT mg2.MEMBER_NO) FROM MEMBER_GROUP mg2 WHERE mg2.GROUP_NO = g.GROUP_NO AND mg2.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N' AND mg2.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N') AS currentPopulation FROM "GROUP" g JOIN CATEGORY c ON g.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO WHERE g.GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MEMBER_GROUP mg WHERE mg.GROUP_NO = g.GROUP_NO AND mg.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND mg.MEMBER_GROUP_BAN = 'N') GROUP BY g.GROUP_NO, g.GROUP_MAIN_IMG, g.GROUP_NAME, g.GROUP_INTRODUCE, c.CATEGORY_NAME, g.GROUP_MAX_POPULATION
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_GROUP SET MEMBER_GROUP_DEL_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND GROUP_NO = #{groupNo}
